abstract: The image of horses performing dressage movements at Saratoga Race Course might have seemed somewhat incongruous if interest in applying the principles of dressage to the training of thoroughbreds, both for racing as well as for their potential postracing careers, wasn't growing steadily.

headline.main: Shifting the Paradigm for Training Racehorses
